description:
A hot chocolate mix for instant deliciousness and a warm inner glow. This generous quantity reduces the waste of unnecessary packaging. Divide it into smaller portions for short or long trips in the wilderness.

  • Certified fair trade, organic, and kosher
  • Ingredients: Golden cane sugar, skim milk powder, cocoa powder guar gum, sea salt, carob bean gum, vanilla powder. May contain traces of egg, soy and wheat. Contains dairy products
name: Camino Fair Trade  & Organic Instant Milk Hot Chocolate
